title: What are some professional writing skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Meet assigned deadlines.Do your best work, then meticulously edit and proofread to make it better.Meet assigned deadlines.Do the required amount, then do MORE.Meet assigned deadlines.Don't argue with the client.Meet assigned deadlines.Treat clients, agents, and everyone you meet with respect and courtesy.Oh, and meet assigned deadlines.Be grateful, not entitled.Did I mention deadlines?

The fundamental core skill is being able to put yourself into the mind of the intended reader. Copywriting is basically writing intended to persuade. First you need a compelling “selling proposition” for the headline. Then you need a concluding paragraph that “asks for the order” whatever it might be.
